content: The surrounding thick fog is a little disconcerting... But don't worry, it's no big deal. Hohoho~
info: 回到帐篷-莫白_莫白任务闲聊

content: Thanks to <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, we were able to spare the time to inspect this Bubble World.
info: 回到帐篷-莫白_莫白任务闲聊

content: We're also about to organize the Camp. Why don't you <color=#8AAB4B>head back to the tent</color> for a while, and see if the furniture picked by Glenn is to your liking?
info: 回到帐篷-莫白_莫白任务闲聊

content: I was hoping this tea will comfort and relax your body and mind. After all, a new environment can be equally exciting and intimidating.
info: 回到帐篷-莫白_莫白任务闲聊

content: Now that <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> and <color=#8AAB4B>Frostia</color> have settled, I'll put away the tea table for now. Frostia said she'll miss it, hoho...
info: 回到帐篷-莫白_莫白任务闲聊

content: However, you can all look forward to the next time we all have tea together. <size=30>I wonder what the Bubble World will look like by then...</size>
info: 回到帐篷-莫白_莫白任务闲聊

content: Take some time to familiarize yourself with the environment. Once you're done settling in, we can move on to some hands-on living.
info: 回到帐篷-莫白_莫白任务闲聊

content: Ah, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, you've gotten <color=#8AAB4B>Frostia</color>'s tent up too? Thank you so much!
info: 回到帐篷-莫白_莫白任务闲聊

content: I don't want you to feel overwhelmed, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, but there are plenty more things to learn, once you've taken care of the camper tent.
info: 回到帐篷-莫白_莫白任务闲聊

content: Maybe you'll have to get used to the tempo of living here first, before the slow life begins.
info: 回到帐篷-莫白_莫白任务闲聊
